gurmukhi: myG SbdnI bkqR qy pRQmY Sbd aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu sumiq svwr ]645]
transliteration: Megh Shabadanibaktra Te Prahmai Shabad Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soumat(i) Savaar||645||
translation: Uttering the word “Megh-shadadni” in the beginning, the names of Tupak are also formed, which may be comprehended correctly.645.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY AwlX AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hY cIn cqur inrDwr ]646]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Aalaya Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Nirdhaar||646||
translation: Uttering firstly the word “Golaa” and the word “Aalaya” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.646.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY DrnI AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu sumiq svwr ]647]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Dharniant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soumat(i) Savaar||647||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Golaa” and then adding “Dharani” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.647.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY AsqRix pun pd dyhu ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur icq lyhu ]648]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Astran(i) Poun Pad Deh(u)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Chit Leh(u)||648||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Astrani”, O wise men ! recognize the names of Tupak.648.

gurmukhi: golwlXxI Awid kih muK qy Sbd aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu sumiq svwr ]649]
transliteration: Golaayaniaadh Kah(i) Moukh Te Shabad Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soumat(i) Savaar||649||
translation: Uttering the word “Golaalayani” in the beginning and the word “Shabad”, the names of tupak are formed.649.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY AwlXxI pun BwKu ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur icq rwKu ]650]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Aalyanipoun Bhaakh(u)|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Chit Raakh(u)||650||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then the word “Aalayani”, the names of Tupak are formed.650.

gurmukhi: golw Awid bKwn kY sdnin AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib ibcwr ]651]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Bakhaan Kai Sadnan(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Bichaar||651||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then “Sadanani” at the end, O good poets, comprehend the name of Tupak.651.

gurmukhi: golw pd piRQmucr kY kyqin pd khu AMq ] nwm skl sRI qupk ky inksq clq AnMq ]652]
transliteration: Golaa Pad Prithamouchar Kai Ketan(i) Pad Kaho Ant|| Naam Sakal Sritoupak Ke Niksat Chalat Anant||652||
translation: Uttering the word “Golla” in the beginning and then adding the word “Ketani” at the end, innumerable names of Tupak continue to be evolved.652.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY kyqin pd ky dIn ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]653]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Ketan(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||653||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Ketani” at the end, O skilful persons ! the names of Tupak are formed.653.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY sdnI AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN cIn cqur inrDwr ]654]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Sadanndant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Cheen Chatur Nirdhaar||654||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Sadni” at the end, O wise men ! the names of Tupak are formed.654.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwrIAY Dwimn AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu sumiq svwr ]655]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Oucdareeai Dhaamin Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soumat(i) Savaar||655||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and uttering the word “Dhamini” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.655.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY neI vwsn kih AMq ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN inksq clq ibAMq ]656]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Naivaasan Kah(i) Ant|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Niksat Chalat Beant||656||
translation: Saying the word Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Nivasani” at the end, innumerable names of Tupak continue be evolved.656.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY ilAwlI AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu suGr svwr ]657]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Liaaliant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Soughar Savaar||657||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Garahikaa” at the end, the names of Tupak continue to be evolved.657.

gurmukhi: golw Awid aucwr kY mukqin AMq aucwr ] nwm qupk ky kh kbo lIjhu skl ibcwr ]658]
transliteration: Golaa Aadh Ouchaar Kai Mouktan(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Kaho Leejoh Sakal Bichaar||658||
translation: Saying the word “Golaa” in the beginning and then adding the word “Muktani” at the end, speak all the names of Tupak thoughtfully.658.
